00013 class FCDocument;
00014 class FCDForceField;
00015 class FCDPhysicsRigidBody;
00016 class FCDPhysicsRigidBodyInstance;
00017 class FCDPhysicsRigidConstraint;
00018 class FCDPhysicsRigidConstraintInstance;
00019 typedef FUObjectContainer<FCDEntityInstance> FCDEntityInstanceContainer;
00020 
00021 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDPhysicsModelInstance : public FCDEntityInstance
00022 {
00023 private:
00024     DeclareObjectType(FCDEntityInstance);
00025     FCDEntityInstanceContainer instances;
00026 
00027 public:
00028     FCDPhysicsModelInstance(FCDocument* document);
00029     virtual ~FCDPhysicsModelInstance();
00030 
00031     FCDEntityInstanceContainer& GetInstances() { return instances; }
00032     const FCDEntityInstanceContainer& GetInstances() const { return instances; }
00033     size_t GetInstanceCount() const { return instances.size(); }
00034     FCDEntityInstance* GetInstance(size_t index) { FUAssert(index < GetInstanceCount(), return NULL); return instances.at(index); }
00035     const FCDEntityInstance* GetInstance(size_t index) const { FUAssert(index < GetInstanceCount(), return NULL); return instances.at(index); }
00036     FCDPhysicsRigidBodyInstance* AddRigidBodyInstance(FCDPhysicsRigidBody* rigidBody = NULL);
00037     FCDPhysicsRigidConstraintInstance* AddRigidConstraintInstance(FCDPhysicsRigidConstraint* rigidConstraint = NULL);
00038     FCDEntityInstance* AddForceFieldInstance(FCDForceField* forceField = NULL);
00039 
00040     // FCDEntity override for RTTI-like
00041     virtual Type GetType() const { return FCDEntityInstance::PHYSICS_MODEL; }
00042 
00043     virtual FCDEntityInstance* Clone(FCDEntityInstance* clone = NULL) const;
00044 
00045     // Load the geometry instance from the COLLADA document
00046     virtual bool LoadFromXML(xmlNode* instanceNode);
00047 
00048     // Write out the instantiation information to the XML node tree
00049     virtual xmlNode* WriteToXML(xmlNode* parentNode) const;
00050 };
